Class DefaultAnalysisConfigurer.ConfigurableBufferSizeKeywordTokenizerFactory

java.lang.Object
org.apache.lucene.analysis.AbstractAnalysisFactory
org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenizerFactory
org.infinispan.query.mapper.mapping.impl.DefaultAnalysisConfigurer.ConfigurableBufferSizeKeywordTokenizerFactory
Enclosing class:
DefaultAnalysisConfigurer
public static final class DefaultAnalysisConfigurer.ConfigurableBufferSizeKeywordTokenizerFactory extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenizerFactory
Similar to KeywordTokenizerFactory but with a configurable buffer size. This tokenizer factory accepts an integer param named "bufferSize" that defaults to 256.
